mix.title: Sorrow-Vomit: 2020-12-25 (2020 Releases Live Mix: Post-Punk, Darkwave, EBM, Cold Wave, Synth, Goth)
mix.shortTitle: 2020-12-25 (2020 Releases Live Mix: Post-Punk, Darkwave, EBM, Cold Wave, Synth, Goth)
mix.description:
Recent and other songs previously released in 2020 ranging from post-punk, darkwave, ebm, goth, cold wave, minimal synth, dark techno, etc. Sorry, not sorry, but no Holiday tunes. Recorded live.
